attributes.action: prohibit foreign nationals and those representing foreign constituencies in Parliament from representing England at International sporting events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It sticks in the throat watching Scottish Ministers (and particularly Scottish Prime Ministers) on the podium greeting the ENGLISH rugby team at the Rugby World Cup finals.  Is it the only way for a Scot to make it to the finals?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
